Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard- BOUND Red Line  trains bypassing Garfield
ShortDescription: Howard- bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard- bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to fire department activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: 95th- Bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are standing  at Garfield due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are standing  at Garfield due to fire department activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. 

These may include:

#29 State

#24 Wentworth

Shuttles busses are available from Sox-35th to 95th to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
